channel.title: AD-Free, Fast Status checker
channel.description:
Okay 50% me for doing the graphics + php code + hosting it, 50% to saad for the original graphics. Use this image URL: (...but change the parts in bold)
http://tobex.info/status.php?ip=[b]google.com[/b]&port=[b]80[/b]
[center][img]http://tobex.info/status.php?ip=google.com&port=80[/img][/center] Hosted at [b]-REMOVED-[/b](Quit whinin now, will ya?) I don't expect anything in return if you use. Just post here if you can think of anything I can change. Note: As I said above, i'm not doing this for rep (obviously), im not doing this for money, im doing this purely to help the community, because I realised everyone is using google status checker image, and its good, but its just a little big and has advertisements.

item.title: AD-Free, Fast Status checker
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Yes but your one has a big goofy RL.com at the bottom of it, no offense, or do you use a different one?

Miss Silabsoft:

i see no problem with this topic. However this has nothing to do with “server development”

Thanks and it kinda does especially where the communication factor is concerned and the website side of things.

Read full topic

item.title: AD-Free, Fast Status checker

item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:6, topic:310127”]i see no problem with this topic. However this has nothing to do with “server development”[/quote]Yes that’s what i meant it didn’t belong there aswell… We already have one.

item.title: AD-Free, Fast Status checker
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:4, topic:310127”]We already have one; we don’t need another.

You’re also advertising your server by posting your site, as the image at the top of your site is linked to your ‘Slashscape’ server website, which isn’t allowed.[/quote]

Read full topic
